name: Komperdell Carbon FXP.4 Approach Vario Poles - Unisex
description: Sturdy, yet light, for rugged summit approaches and multi-day adventures. The 4-section construction folds up super short, which is handy when you're climbing or running.Aluminum upper segment and carbon lower keeps the weight way down.Lightweight Trek Pro Foam grips are comfortable in the hand.3 folding sections and an adjustable telescoping top segment for easy carrying. Solid connections make reassembly fast and easy.FlickLock Pro system allows fast, secure length adjustment.Tungsten carbid flex tip provides solid grip.
